title: mophie Juice Pack Wireless & Charging Base for iPhone 6/6s 3399_JPRW-IP6-BLK - Overview
description:
Shop for the mophie Juice Pack Wireless & Charging Base for iPhone 6/6s - 3399_JPRW-IP6-BLK at Abt: http://www.abt.com/product/102869/mophie-Black-Juice-Pack-Wireless-Charging-Base-for-iPhone-6-6s-3399JPRWIP6BLK.html?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=video&utm_campaign=3399JPRWIP6BLK_20160913

The juice pack wireless made for iPhone 6s/6 provides full case protection and the extra power you expect from mophie as well as the option to recharge the phone and case using virtually any wireless charging technology.

Features:

Charge on the spot:
Simply place your phone and juice pack with charge force wireless power on any wireless charging base and power is sent to your phone and case on contact.

Stay powerful using any wireless charging technology:
Compatible with Qi and other wireless charging technologies you can top off your phone and juice pack case in cafes cars or anywhere that has a wireless charge system available.

Perfect for your home or office:
The juice pack wireless case includes a wireless charging base but why not keep a charger at your desk in addition to the one next to your bed? mophie offers charge force mounts for your home desk and car so go ahead and set yourself up to be fully charged at all times.

Power Beyond boundaries:
Wireless isnt the only option for charging when using the juice pack wireless. The cases built-in battery is ready to deliver more than 50 extra battery when youre on the town and need it most.

Additional Talk Time: 7 Hours

Additional Internet Usage: 5 Hours

Additional Video Playback: 6 Hours

Slim profile with full case protection:
In addition to a compact design and charge force wireless power the juice pack wireless battery case still provides the protection you need to keep your phone safe from everyday wear and tear.

Priority+ charge & sync:
Enables pass-through charge & sync with the included micro USB cable when connected to a computer. Your iPhone 6s/6 recharges first and then the juice pack case recharges itself.

Know before you go:
Integrated standby button allows you to choose when to charge or save some juice for when you need it most. The LED power indicator displays the juice pack battery levels and charge status. Know before you go.

Forward facing speaker ports:
Thanks to acoustic sound-enhancing forward-facing speaker ports that full rich speaker sound youre used to is always there.

Specifications:
Compatibility: iPhone 6s/6
Battery capacity: 1560mAh

In the box:
Juice pack wireless
Universal charging base
Micro USB cable

Approximate Weight:
Shipping: 1 lbs

Warranty Information:

Manufacturer Warranty (authorized online retailer): 2 Year Parts And Labor
